item.description:
Haloween party for Lunedi Italiano people at Milena's house - it starts a 8PM so DO NOT arrive fashionably late, please.

249 Pearl Street,
Cambridge,
MA 02139

The closest metro stop is on the red line - Central and is only 10 minutes walk

It is pot-luck food and drink - so everyone please bring something to eat and drink - Milean will make some things to get it started.
item.how_to_find_us: si puo dire di che citta' e' la squadra si chiama Juventus

group.name: The Boston Italian Language Meetup Group & Luned√¨ Italiano

item.name: FESTA DI HALOWEEN (VEGLIA DELLA SOLMENITA' DI TUTTI I SANTI)
